title: Wish You Were Here
lyrics: Vòng hợp âm chuẩn theo giong Avril Lavigne: E B C#m A I can be tough I can be strong But with you, It's not like that at all Theres a girl who gives a shit Behind this wall You just walk through it And I remember all those crazy thing you said You left them running through my head You're always there, you're everywhere But right now I wish you were here Damn, Damn, Damn Here, Here, Here I love the way you are
